UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: A Head-to-Head Comparison of the Antimicrobial Activities of 30 Ultra-Short Antimicrobial Peptides Against Staphylococcus aureus, Pseudomonas aeruginosa and Candida albicans
Literature.Author: Lau QY, Choo XY, Lim ZX, Kong XN, Ng FM, Ang M, Hill J, Chia CS

Literature.Title: Minimal antimicrobial peptidic sequence from hemoglobin alpha-chain: KYR.
Literature.Author: Catiau L, Traisnel J, Delval-Dubois V, Chihib NE, Guillochon D, Nedjar-Arroume N

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus USA 100(MIC=>100µM),Staphylococcus aureus USA 300(MIC=>100µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MIC=>100µM),Candida albicans ATCC 90028(MIC=>100µM),Escherichia coli(MIC=1µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Enteritidis(MIC=1µM),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=1µM),Listeria innocua(MIC=1µM),Micrococcus luteus(MIC=2µM)
